value:
$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Alfonse! Sharena!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Mother?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Mother! What are you doing here?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, there you are. You look well,
both of you! I'm so glad.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Your Majesty! Have you been
wandering the castle without your
guards?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Commander Anna! It's been some
time. Thank you for taking Alfonse
and Sharena under your wing.$k$pWhat a castle you have here! All of
these Heroes... It's lovely.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I'd like to introduce you to our
summoner, $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Smile|So YOU'RE $Nu!$k$pI've heard all about you from
Sharena. It's such a treat to meet
you. You've done so much for Askr.$k$pI am Henriette. Thank you for all
you've done for my children.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Mother... Why have you come?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|To bring you back home. Your father
needs to speak to you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|He does? Last we spoke, I
understood that he... He did
not wish to see me again.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Don't worry. He's the one who asked
me to come and get you.$k$pHe wishes to speak to you privately.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What could be so important?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Oh, you know how he is. You'll find
out soon enough.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Let's get your things together,
Alfonse, and be on our way!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What? The enemy!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Here in Askr? But how? We're
nowhere near the border.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I've heard nothing from our scouts
or the border patrols!$k$pYet look at the size of this army...
Where did they come from?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Take a look at their uniforms—these
soldiers appear to be from Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Anger|No. They are from Hel.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|No time for that now! Your Majesty,
stand back. We're going to engage
the enemy. Get ready, everyone!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_05,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|They're vanishing...like specters.$k$pWhat is this?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Cool|These soldiers...had already died.
They're Emblian soldiers who fell in
battle.$k$pThey are now the vanguard of the
realm of the dead.$k$pHow cruel...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Did you say "the realm of the dead"?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. Some who pass on go to a joyful
place. Others...descend to a realm of
unending darkness.$k$pThat realm is called Hel. Your father
will explain more...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So this is what Father wants to talk
to me about.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Yes. And now, I fear we have less
time than I thought...$k$p$EFace|Let us hurry to His Majesty.$k$p$Sbs150|
